endpoints.description: Retrieve the real-time stock prices for specified companies.
Obtain historical financial data and trends for analysis.
Access information about major market indices and their values.
Fetch the latest news articles and updates related to financial markets.
Retrieve detailed financial data for a given security.
Subscribe to real-time alerts based on predefined triggers.
